projects.title: Splash Image Gallery
projects.description: A responsive react web application that allows users to search for free stock images and video. There are three pages namely: Home, Videos, and Challenges. The Home and Videos pages search an input and display a grid of images and videos respectively. The contributor's name and user image is also displayed on each card when hovered. The Challenges page displays the current challenge as well as the past challenges that have been closed.

projects.title: Housed Real Estate
projects.description: A responsive real estate website that takes the input of a two character state abbreviation. When the state is searched its rental properties listings is then displayed in a new tab. The service section displays the services offered, while the featured section displays three properties with its rent, square footage, bedroom and bathroom information. The contact section lists the contact information with a contact form and a map that shows the location.

projects.title: Login and Sign Up Form
projects.description: A form that allows users to login and sign up, and its input validated. If a password is forgotten then they are redirected to enter the email used to sign up and a reset link sent. The form can not be submitted unless agreement to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy is clicked.
